snippet: Volunteer-run minivans are evacuating children from the besieged eastern city of Slovyansk, taking them beyond the reach of artillery fire and twitchy gunmen.
abstract: Volunteer-operated minivans have begun evacuating children out of violence-plagued city of Slovyansk, Ukraine, navigating dangerous route out of city; pro-Russian militias have been fighting the Ukrainian Army in eastern Ukraine and control contested cities like Slovyansk; Ukrainian Pres Petro O Poroshenko has called for establishment of escape corridor to allow civilians to leave, but political conflicts have hindered its creation.
lead_paragraph: Volunteer-run minivans are evacuating children from the besieged eastern city of Slovyansk, taking them beyond the reach of artillery fire and twitchy gunmen.

headline.main: Evacuating Children Along a Dangerous Ukraine Route
headline.print_headline: Evacuating Children Along a Dangerous Ukraine Route
